name: VRange
description:
VRange is Hot! Shoot, Boom and Blast your way onto the firing range! Pray and Spray across a wide range of environments, taking advantage of a library of fully interactive weapons! Pick your weapon, lock and load your magazines and tear those targets apart!



Compete against players from around the globe with VRange leaderboards. Strength, skill and aggression all take effect as players battle their way around timed CQB courses. Make your shots count as every miss will lower your accuracy stats. When the battles through you'll be given the choice to feature your times and scores through the VRange online leaderboards.



Delve into the role of a CQB operative with VRange scenarios. Secure hostage rescues, hold off marauding terrorist cells and foil the plans of bank thieves. VRange offers a range of scenarios that will truly test the skills of the player. You'll have complete freedom with how you approach each scenario, look at dynamic entry points, think about your weapon load out. Do you take a stealthy option and avoid detection or tear in with guns blazing? It's up to you, but each scenario is player driven by the choices he/she makes.
